thread.section_title: Experthelp.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Experthelp.com | www.experthelp.com
thread.title: Greenpointer

author: Greenpointer
title: Greenpointer
text: The technician worked diligently and expertly to sort out the problem. Based on his evaluation and assistance we were able to used some free software to isolate the problem and resolve the poor computer performance . A job well done, considering that it was all done via an internet connection. I was very impressed by how the analysis was done, the solutions were identified and the computer restored to a vastly improved condition. Still working great!!! Thanks for the effort and expertise.
